<script type="text/ng-template" id="inPackageModal.html">
	<div class="modal-header">
		<h3 class="modal-title">{{ inPackageModal.title + ' - ' + inPackageModal.list.length + ' Boreholes' }}</h3>
	</div>
	<div class="modal-body">
		<div class="package-content not-hidden">
			<div class="modal-activelayers" id="{{ 'inp-' + al.id }}" ng-repeat="(key, al) in inPackageModal.list" >
				<div class="modal-activelayer-bar" ng-click="al.showContent = !al.showContent">
					<div class="modal-activelayer-name">
						{{ al.name }}
					</div>
					<div class="modal-activelayer-showhide glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-down"></div>
				</div>
				<div class="content" ng-class="{ 'hidden': !al.showContent }">
					<div class="activelayer-metas">

						<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_1 in al.content">
							<div class="col-md-3 title">{{ level_1.title }}</div>
							<div class="col-md-9 value" ng-if="notArray(level_1.type)">{{ level_1.value }}</div>
							<div class="col-md-9 value noPadding" ng-if="isArray(level_1.type)">

								<div ng-click="level_1.showContent = !level_1.showContent" class="toggle-subitem glyphicon" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up': level_1.showContent, 'glyphicon-chevron-down': !level_1.showContent}">
								</div>

								<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_2 in level_1.value" ng-class="{ 'hidden': !level_1.showContent }">
									<div class="col-md-3 title">{{ level_2.title }}</div>
									<div class="col-md-9 value">{{ level_2.value }}</div>
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="col-md-9 value noPadding" ng-if="isMultiArray(level_1.type)">

								<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_2 in level_1.value">

									<div ng-click="level_2.showContent = !level_2.showContent" class="toggle-subitem glyphicon" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up': level_2.showContent, 'glyphicon-chevron-down': !level_2.showContent}">
										{{ level_2[0].value }}
									</div>
									<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_3 in level_2" ng-class="{ 'hidden': !level_2.showContent }">
										<div class="col-md-3 title">{{ level_3.title }}</div>
										<div class="col-md-9 value" ng-if="notArray(level_3.type)">{{ level_3.value }}</div>

										<div class="col-md-9 value noPadding" ng-if="isArray(level_3.type)">

											<div ng-click="level_3.showContent = !level_3.showContent" class="toggle-subitem glyphicon" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up': level_3.showContent, 'glyphicon-chevron-down': !level_3.showContent}">
											</div>

											<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_4 in level_3.value" ng-class="{ 'hidden': !level_3.showContent }">
												<div class="col-md-3 title">{{ level_4.title }}</div>
												<div class="col-md-9 value">{{ level_4.value }}</div>
											</div>
										</div>
										<div class="col-md-9 value noPadding" ng-if="isMultiArray(level_3.type)">

											<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_4 in level_3.value">

												<div ng-click="level_4.showContent = !level_4.showContent" class="toggle-subitem glyphicon" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up': level_4.showContent, 'glyphicon-chevron-down': !level_4.showContent}">
													{{ level_4[0].value }}
												</div>
												<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_5 in level_4" ng-class="{ 'hidden': !level_4.showContent }">
													<div class="col-md-3 title">{{ level_5.title }}</div>
													<div class="col-md-9 value" ng-if="notArray(level_5.type)">{{ level_5.value }}</div>

													<div class="col-md-9 value noPadding" ng-if="isArray(level_5.type)">

														<div ng-click="level_5.showContent = !level_5.showContent" class="toggle-subitem glyphicon" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up': level_5.showContent, 'glyphicon-chevron-down': !level_5.showContent}">
														</div>

														<div class="row" ng-repeat="level_6 in level_5.value" ng-class="{ 'hidden': !level_5.showContent }">

						</div>

			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="terms hidden">
			<div class="terms-title">Data Policy</div>
			<div class="terms-desc">Kindly inform the appropriate Principal Investigators (PI&acute;s) of how you are using soil temperature (TSP) and active layer (CALM) data and if you are planning a publication. If the PI&acute;s feel that they should be acknowledged or offered participation as authors, they will let you know, and we assume that an agreement on such matters will be reached prior to publishing and/or use of the data for publication. If your work directly competes with the PI&acute;s analysis, they may ask to have the opportunity to submit a manuscript before you submit the one that uses their data. In addition, when publishing a paper using permafrost data, please acknowledge the agency that supported the permafrost research.</div>

			<div class="terms-title">Data Update Policy</div>
			<div class="terms-desc">The PAGE21/GTN-P DMS provides access to permafrost data provided by Investigators as complete and accurate at the time of submission. We encourage users to check with data providers the availability of updated data. We also encourage users to provide information to the data providers and to the PAGE21/GTN-P DMS team if suspect values are found in the data. The extensive site characteristic data were compiled from individuals, Web sites, and literature reports. This information may not be complete and equivalent for every site. We encourage users to contact us if you have additional site characteristic data for the TSP or CALM sites.</div>
			<div class="terms-btns">
				<a ng-href="{{zip}}" target="_self" class="download-btn no-hidden">
					<button class="btn btn-success" ng-click="inPackageModal.close()">I agree</button>
				</a>
				<button class="btn btn-danger" ng-click="inPackageModal.close()">I do not</button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="modal-footer">
		<button class="download-btn btn btn-success" ng-click="terms()">Download Package</button>
		<button class="btn btn-danger" ng-click="inPackageModal.close()">Close</button>
	</div>
